comments.author: Mr. Magkaisa
comments.body: -  Is it really necessary to show the image that you won, because I don't have a habit of taking a picture of what I won, but he has a history of withdrawal from the gambling platform if it hasn't been lost there.Also, what I won was not that big, it was only 116$ and then I only took out 80$ and the rest I still bet when I had something free and this is all I do.

comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: If you are going to make a thread like this with rules, better to make the thread self moderated, else, your rules will mean absolutely nothing to spammers, this is if they even read it at all.Like you rightly said, not everybody like to share their gambling wins or loses publicly, as from such, on-lookers could try to figure out or estimate a user's worth, which is not so cool, but for those who don't care about the above, I think this is another good way to have some fun, So I am looking forward to seeing some really funny loses and amazing wins posted here, maybe I will join in the fun if I get a good win too  .

(ignore bad english)For entertainment purpose only.As Fivestar4everMVP said above, you can't enforce rules without putting your thread in self-moderated mode, because I don't think any moderator will remove a post not respecting your own requirements if the post respects the general forum rules. And unfortunately I don't think it's possible for a user to convert a thread into self-moderated mode once it has been created. Only admins and maybe global moderators should be able to do that.Anyway, in addition to pictures I think people should be allowed to post videos of their big wins or big losses, and slot "replays". Indeed, many slots offer a replay feature with a sharing link when people hit high multipliers. A topic dedicated to the big losses separated from the one of the big wins would be more appropriate though.

comments.body: I know it's just for fun, I don't really think it's a nice idea sharing your win on the forum here, when it comes to financial aspects, we should always learn to keep it personal, we shouldn't disclose our worth on the internet, not everything is suppose to be shared on the internet.
